entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of light snow this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 27 February 2023
